word_mean: 肾小球性肾炎：肾炎的一种，特征为肾小球毛细血管袢炎症，呈急性、亚急性和慢性三种类型，可能继发于溶血性链球菌感染。也有证据支持可能是免疫机制或自身免疫机制所致

means.word_mean: 1. nephritis marked by inflammation of the glomeruli of the kidney; characterized by decreased production of urine and by the presence of blood and protein in the urine and by edema
